titles.title: Train Noise and Vibrations Reduction Act of 2025
Train Noise and Vibrations Reduction Act of 2025
To require the Comptroller General of the United States to develop and submit a report to Congress on recommendations to reduce train noise and vibrations near homes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary:
Train Noise and Vibrations Reduction Act of 2025
This bill directs the Government Accountability Office to develop and submit to Congress a report containing (1) recommendations to reduce train noise and vibrations near homes, and (2) estimates of the costs and benefits of such recommendations.
